I felt a strange tug at that exact point in time..... almost like a longing feeling. And then nothing. 

And nothing ever since.

And so I must let my brother go.

Our bond, our soulmate bond is severed..... but life here goes on.

And I must go onwards with it. My life full..... and half of my soul empty.
